name: 9gag Dark - Improved - CLEAN
description:
A Theme for 9gag to make it dark and overall a very nice experience.
Added a few little Details and improvements.
This is still a work in progress - so if you find any issues or have troubles with the theme please let me know.
additional_info:
WORK IN PROGRESS - Hit me up if you find something to be changed or issues with the theme.

08.05.
-and again fixing the same shit - maybe for longer now

05.05.
-fixing the same shit over again -.-

28.04.2021
-fixed sum stupid color changes
-boards are still fucked.

31.03.2021
- fixed some background changes
- they decided to change the boards colors again. But i never use that sh*t so i don't care anymore. 

09.03.2021
- Menu moved back to the left for more options
- Removed some additional ad stuff (nobody wants that anyway)
- adapted some more of the boards stuff

13.01.2021
- Fixed latest changes to the comment section

05.12.2019
- Fixed the new notifications menu

26.10.2018
- Fixed the white background that came with the change to the "dark theme" of 9gag which just inverts the colors and looks awful.


14.09.2018 Last change:
- Removed the nonsense section part above posts. 
- Adjusted some backgrounds to match better.


16.06.2018

- Removed the ugly and unnecessary share buttons.


30.05.2018 Last change:

- Menu is now on top next to the 9gag logo (Screenshot needs to be updated i know.)
- Reduced space between the top menu and the posts.


29.05.2018

- CLEANED it's pure 9gag, nothing else (did not clean my code though - i know it's a mess)

- Horizontal Menu (Hot , Trending, Fresh)

- Fixed up/down vote into upper right corner
- Fixed black on black fonts (probably not everywhere yet let me know your findings)
- Fixed tags (even though nobody likes em)

- Removed Sections
- Removed Footer
- Removed top menu
- Removed mobile notification in the bottom right (ugly emoji is also gone)

-Textarea is now bigger and can be resized.
